svg.text: jsgui3-html ‚Äî Refined Premium Luna: Businesslike, Readable, Consistent
Subtle gradients ¬∑ Consistent 8px grid ¬∑ Clear hierarchy ¬∑ Professional warmth
‚Ä¢ Gradients use 4 stops, subtle midpoint shift
‚Ä¢ Borders: midtone, not dark ‚Äî readable, not harsh
‚Ä¢ Selection: solid blue, white text ‚Äî clear focus
